head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOFFMAN, COL. LEO L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOFFMAN, COL. LEO L.

block.p: HOFFMAN-Col. Leo L. In his 96th year, on October 6, 2002. Adored husband and extraordinary partner to his wife Grace. Loyal and loving to all who knew him. He was a valiant soldier, a brilliant lawyer and a faithful friend. Private services were held.

HOFFMAN-Leo. The Board of Directors of Camp Vacamas mourn the passing of Leo Hoffman, a past president and true friend. Leo Hoffman will be greatly missed. To Grace Hoffman, his loving and adoring wife, our hearts and thoughts are with you. Andrew Dunberg, President
